content: hannah s cushion was originally published as a free pattern for members of my facebook group rosina crochets and the free pattern may still be obtained from there the pdfs listed here include a clear easy to read chart and full written instructions to make up the cushion using the inset mosaic crochet 2-row technique and are available in both uk and us terms there is also a bonus chart for those of you who prefer to use the overlay mosaic crochet 1-row technique but i cannot accept any responsibility for the finished item if you choose to use this method nor am i able to provide support for this support for the original inset mosaic pattern is of course offered and the quickest way to contact me is via my facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/rosinacrochets/ *please note these patterns and chart have not gone through my usual testing process so there is a possibility that some small errors may have slipped through i have reduced my usual selling price to reflect this but if you do notice any errors please do let me know *
